text: Nathan Harriel (born April 23, 2001) is an American soccer player who plays for Philadelphia Union in MLS. == Career == Harriel appeared as an amateur player for USL Championship side Bethlehem Steel during their 2019 season, as well as being part of the Philadelphia Union academy. In 2019, Harriel verbally committed to play college soccer at Clemson University. However, on July 17, 2020, Harriel signed with Philadelphia Union as a homegrown player, beginning from the 2021 season. They acquired his homegrown rights from Orlando City SC in exchange for a first round 2021 MLS SuperDraft pick.https://www.philadelphiaunion.com/post/2020/07/17/philadelphia-union- sign-defender-nathan-harriel-homegrown-contract == References == == External links == * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:Homegrown Players (MLS) Category:Philadelphia Union II players Category:Philadelphia Union players Category:People from Oldsmar, Florida Category:Soccer players from Florida Category:Sportspeople from Pinellas County, Florida Category:USL Championship players
title: Nathan Harriel
